attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Biggs is no longer any threat to Society. He is an old sick man. It is total waste of public  money to keep a sick man under gauard.

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions, we cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
